basic.description: Sampling theorem, filter realization structures, quantization errors and finite word length effects, digital signal processor programming, finite and infinite impulse response filter design techniques, discrete and fast Fourier transform.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Digital Signal Processing: Filters and System Design

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of (ELEC321 and ELEC324) or (MATH334 and MATH335) and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
